StatusCodes.301: The requested resource has been moved permanently.
StatusCodes.302: The requested resource has moved, but was found.
StatusCodes.304: The requested resource has not been modified since the last time you accessed it.
StatusCodes.403: Access to that resource is forbidden.
StatusCodes.404: The requested resource was not found.
StatusCodes.408: The server timed out waiting for the rest of the request from the browser.
StatusCodes.410: The requested resource is gone and wont be coming back.
StatusCodes.500: There was an error on the server and the request could not be completed
StatusCodes.503: The server is unavailable to handle this request right now.
StatusCodes.504: The server, acting as a gateway, timed out waiting for another server to respond.
